00017 void SwarmActivityModel::Empty() {

00019         doc->m_ActivityData.sActivity.RemoveAll();

00022 SwarmActivityModel::SwarmActivityModel(void) {
00023         m_eventDetector[0] = new ProximityEventDetector("Spatial Proximity", IDDS_PROXIMITYEVENTDETECTOR);
00024         m_eventDetector[1] = new GroupingEventDetector("Grouping", IDDS_GROUPINGEVENTDETECTOR);
00025         m_eventDetector[2] = new LeaderFollowingEventDetector("Leader Following", IDDS_LEADERFOLLOWINGEVENTDETECTOR);
00026         m_eventDetector[3] = new LiningUpEventDetector("Lining Up", IDDS_LININGUPEVENTDETECTOR);
00027         m_eventDetector[4] = new CoDwellingEventDetector("Co-dwelling", IDDS_CODWELLINGEVENTDETECTOR);
00028 
00029         m_initialized = false;
00030 }
00031 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
00032 SwarmActivityModel::~SwarmActivityModel(void) {
00033         for (int i=0;i<N_EVENT_TYPES;i++)
00034                 delete m_eventDetector[i];
00035 }
00036 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
00037 bool SwarmActivityModel::Initialize() {
00038         if (m_initialized)
00039                 DeInitialize();
00040         int sizes[2] = {50, 50};
00041         sActorAdjacency = cvCreateSparseMat(2, sizes, CV_32FC1);
00042         //SwarmEvent::last_id = 0;
00043         //SwarmActivity::last_id = 0;
00044         m_initialized = true;
00045         return true;
00046 }
00047 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
00048 void SwarmActivityModel::DeInitialize() {
00049         if (!m_initialized)
00050                 return;
00051         m_initialized = false;
00052         Empty();
00053         cvReleaseSparseMat(&sActorAdjacency);
00054 }

00057 BodyPathCluster* SwarmActivityModel::FindCluster(CArray<BodyPathCluster*> group, int groupid) {
00058         for (int i=0;i<group.GetCount();i++) 
00059                 if (group[i]->id == groupid)
00060                         return group[i];
00061         return NULL;
00062 }

00094 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
00095 void SwarmActivityModel::DetectEvents(int nFrame) {
00096         int ecount = 0;
00097         for (int i=0;i<N_EVENT_TYPES;i++)
00098                 if (m_eventType[i]) {
00099                         ecount += m_eventDetector[i]->DetectEvents(nFrame, doc);
00100                 }
00101 
00102         int acount = 0;
00103         for (int i=0;i<N_EVENT_TYPES;i++)
00104                 if (m_eventType[i]) {
00105                         acount += m_eventDetector[i]->DetectActivities(nFrame, doc);
00106                 }
00107 
00108 }

00113 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
00114 void SwarmActivityModel::DrawEventsFrame(IplImage* frame, CvScalar color, int nFrame) {
00115         if (nFrame == -1)
00116                 nFrame = doc->trackermodel.m_frameNumber;
00117         int RADIUS = 5;
00118         SwarmEvent* ev = NULL;
00119         GetFirstEvent(nFrame);
00120         while (GetNextEvent(nFrame, ev)) {
00121                 POSITION pos = ev->actors.GetStartPosition(); 
00122                 while (pos) {
00123                         int id; double c;
00124                         ev->actors.GetNextAssoc(pos, id, c);
00125                         Body* b;
00126                         if (doc->bodymodel.body.Lookup(id, b))
00127                                 cvCircle(frame, cvPointFrom32f(b->GetImageCenter()), RADIUS, colorFromID(ev->id), CV_FILLED, CV_AA);
00128                 }
00129         }
00130 }
00131 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
00132 void SwarmActivityModel::DrawActivitiesFrame(IplImage* frame, CvScalar color, int nFrame) {
00133         if (nFrame == -1)
00134                 nFrame = doc->trackermodel.m_frameNumber;
00135         int RADIUS = 10;
00136         SwarmEvent* ev = NULL;
00137         GetFirstActivity(nFrame);
00138         while (GetNextEvent(nFrame, ev)) {
00139                 for (int i=0; i < ev->actors.GetCount(); i++) {
00140                         Body* b;
00141                         if (doc->bodymodel.body.Lookup(ev->actors[i], b))
00142                                 cvCircle(frame, cvPointFrom32f(b->GetImageCenter()), RADIUS, colorFromID(ev->id), CV_FILLED, CV_AA);
00143                 }
00144         }
00145 }
00146 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
00147 void SwarmActivityModel::GetFirstEvent(int nFrame) {
00148         eventsExtracted = 0;
00149 }
00150 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
00151 bool SwarmActivityModel::GetNextEvent(int nFrame, SwarmEvent* &evOut) {
00152         int nFound = 0;
00153         POSITION posE = doc->m_ActivityData.sEvent.GetStartPosition();
00154         while (posE) {
00155                 int id; SwarmEvent *ev;
00156                 doc->m_ActivityData.sEvent.GetNextAssoc(posE, id, ev);
00157                         if (ev->start <= nFrame && ev->stop >= nFrame) {
00158                         nFound++;
00159                         if (nFound > eventsExtracted) {
00160                                 evOut = ev;
00161                                 eventsExtracted++;
00162                                 return true;
00163                         }
00164                 }
00165         }
00166         return false;
00167 }
00168 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
00169 void SwarmActivityModel::GetFirstActivity(int nFrame) {
00170         activitiesExtracted = 0;
00171 }
00172 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
00173 bool SwarmActivityModel::GetNextActivity(int nFrame, SwarmActivity* &acOut) {
00174         int nFound = 0;
00175         POSITION posA = doc->m_ActivityData.sActivity.GetStartPosition();
00176         while (posA) {
00177                 int id; SwarmActivity *ac;
00178                 doc->m_ActivityData.sActivity.GetNextAssoc(posA, id, ac);
00179                 if (ac->start <= nFrame && ac->stop >= nFrame) {
00180                         nFound++;
00181                         if (nFound > activitiesExtracted) {
00182                                 acOut = ac;
00183                                 activitiesExtracted++;
00184                                 return true;
00185                         }
00186                 }
00187         }
00188         return false;
00189 }
